item.title: Looking Back on 20+ Years of Programming - Dev Leader Weekly 100
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss my reflections looking back on 20 years of programming and building software. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/06/28/looking-back-on-20-years-of-programming-dev-leader-weekly-100
